lines.text: What's the speed on that water elemental?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to pull it up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Used a bonus action to transform, that's both your Wild Shapes--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am going to Polymorph into a dolphin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So double movement that's 120 feet per round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you're shooting forward, making your way towards that cliff--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: ♪ Making your way towards that cliff ♪

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, you're trying to swim along, you're in the water with Derrig?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You and Derrig are both now in the water trying to swim.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, just trying to swim towards Percy because that's all we can-- all I can hear.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm running straight up all of the-- triple dash, looking over the edge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another death saving throw for me, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Son of a bitch, son of a bitch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, just roll high, that's all you got to do is roll high.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Feel like, regardless of success or failure, is my lungs are filling with water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, if you roll three successes, we're going to keep rolling, this is to see how long you last underwater.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't stabilize underwater while you're drowning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to still say, it's hard to step away from Caduceus, but--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're still a ways away, though, but traveling quickly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh man, what do I even have?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You are dying, I'll remind you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't die, I have shifting bulges coming to save me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We all deal with death in different ways.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Time for some creative thinking, I guess.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I have lots of that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we're both the weakest motherfuckers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to try one more time to just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you trying to break the chains? Wait, what are you trying to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm trying to break the lock.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just straight up break the lock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a brute force against the lock, it's going to be strength.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Feels like a decent hit, but it still holds.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god, mother-- Do I have anything left that I can--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another death saving throw for you, Vex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --making your way as fast as you can in that direction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my god, what if I don't-- what if I die?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we get all of our gifts back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't think you can do it as a water elemental.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I just want to use everything I have to get there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am in a wedding dress. Don't kill me when I'm in a wedding dress.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not in your wedding dress at the rehearsal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm still trucking up the cliff side, is there anything as I'm running up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The shouting seems to have gotten their attention.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I see what they are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Keyleth, Scanlan, you guys are rushing quickly--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Darkvision too, can I see them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're quite a distance away, you can just barely see Percy perched on the edge of the cliff, shouting and trying to break his lock against the stone.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Am I getting close to Percy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, they're further than that from you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm trying to go towards Percy, so don't I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're-- it's like trying to swim behind a motor boat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He has a ring of free movement, does that have any effect on water, am I going normal speed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does. You're going normal speed through the water.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, not as fast as them, but pretty good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you are, Pike, unfortunately being left in the suds a bit here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know what else to do--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are getting close, but you're not--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, I need you to roll another death saving throw, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you rush up, the next round, and arrive as a water elemental in that space, and you can see her body just drift below the ocean, the eyes glazed over, unmoving.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then Percy seems okay, can I see Percy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's alive? And I'm going to immediately double back and get her back to Pike, A-snaps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the water elemental's now motor boating opposite direction, (slicing through water).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a big blobby water getting in reverse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A few moments pass, Pike, as you're trying to keep up, you watch as your new, half-elf friend there looks and spins as one heavy, moving, shifting burst of water just cruises up in your direction before splashing you in the face and you see a large water elemental Keyleth emerge from the ocean holding the unmoving body of Vex.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like a rolling wave onto the beach, I just come up out of the water and drop them both onto the beach.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you move past Pike, then?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And crash onto the beach with them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all get thrown out onto the sand and there you see Vex (rolling body) onto the--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is she okay, is she okay?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I drop form. I think she's dead, you have to do something, immediately.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I reach out, I put my hands out, and I cast True Resurrection.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Has it been under a minute?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What do all-- is True Resurrection--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: True Resurrection does cost at least 25,000 gold worth of diamonds to do.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hold on, hold on, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, because resurrection--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait but I thought these mean a-- shit, sorry, this has been a while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know it's been a while, it's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have diamonds on you, as part of this wedding?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you wearing any jewelry for the event?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Vex's has got to be wearing some bling,

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I already used my ring, for the search for Bob, but-- And we haven't replaced them yet, we were going to do that tomorrow, dear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know how-- if they're worth that much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead, Pike, and roll 2d6 for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six, all right, the earrings that Vex has on are worth approximately 600 gold worth of diamonds, all over on them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pump those fucking earrings into her body!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think that's how it works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as part of our resurrection ritual elements there--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, wait, wait, DM, DM, DM, DM.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the Revivify has an element here, where, when it brings you back I roll, just in general, to see if the previous resurrections you've had to see what the different DC is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, yes, the twins died to the Briarwoods.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Disintegration and you went down, too, but--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, regardless, that's higher than the DC would have had, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, suddenly, Vex coughs up sea water and doubles over, spitting it onto the edge of the ocean.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was the DC 12 or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was either 11 or 12 based on how many she died, so the natural 13 worked out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm scaling up the cliff face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I go back into elemental form, grab Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're out there as the dolphin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, Keyleth you rush over and hit the edge, as the dolphin, and you look up and you can see Percival's slowly crab walking up the side of this cliff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we have earrings, can we talk to each other through our fucking earrings?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have them on, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The cliff is just stone, there's nothing--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's stone and minerals, and salts, and sea gull shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you get her? Did you get her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are approaching the edge of the cliff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, they're like tourists looking over the edge?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you see, for the first time, Sylas Briarwood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys had dinner in the sunset, remember?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The four other figures begin to move rapidly, in a flanking position as he walks towards you, confidently.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dragging a blade behind him, across the stone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Same blade that he fought you guys with at the battle in Thar Amphala.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) Actually, no, this is an axe, it's a greataxe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When I get over to Percy, I'm going to drop my polymorph, cling on to the rocks, see him struggling up there, and cast Polymorph on him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And turn him into a raven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right (fluttering), you are now a raven, Percival.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're good, I just need help getting up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I get a move, a round?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seeing as how this has now turned into a combat scenario.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's going to turn off his torches.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to fight fucking Sylas?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There might be a Delilah clone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't believe I just fucking died.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was stressful, way too stressful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to leave you as a raven for, like, 30 seconds, so you can get up to the fucking top of the thing and then I'm going to drop it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Am I going to still be manacled when I'm in the raven?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That cliff edge there is about roughly 150 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Grog, you're approached to about there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't have any guns or anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't have any of our stuff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How are we going to do anything?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuckin' Sylas, I thought he was deader'en shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought he turned into a mist.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm ready to fight for my life.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I look like a New Orleans funeral driver.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm Duke of York this evening.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm just going to keep concentrating on him for like another-- until I see him get over the edge and then I was going to drop it, basically.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Meanwhile, Pike and Keyleth, you are currently in--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm in the water as a water elemental.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you cruise around and you were right there next to Scanlan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You had placed me, I was just trying to keep up with her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little ways away over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Pike-- did you bring Pike, or is anybody else with you or are you guys still on the beach?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I dropped Pike on the beach with Vex.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When swimming, will we do action-- movement and use action as a further movement?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah I mean, I would, that would be mean 60 feet of range for me swimming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So we have-- What's your dexterity?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is your favored terrain, Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do a little Billy Elliot move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, the other two do, and they have advantage because they have you flanked.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we say that because I have persistent rage and the danger has not subsided, that I could rage all the way through running, all the way up the cliff from the wedding site? From the rehearsal dinner?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you really want to, sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I wouldn't have dropped it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, you been real angry at the fact that the couple went missing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be a 25 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take six points of slashing damage, reduced to three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Claw attack again, that's going to be a 22 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take another nine points of slashing damage reduced to four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be a 33 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be 24 points slashing damage reduced to 12.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt did not come to play softball tonight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys left my fucking dust titan behind in the last one shot, I'm going to make this right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We all were, like, busy finding our fucking outfits for tonight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's going to be 27 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With my action, I would like to try and lunge forward and tackle Sylas and drive him straight backwards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and make a-- We'll say a grapple-- is this a shove? Try and push him back?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, how far is a shove?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because your strength is so high, I'll say it's half your strength modifier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, so my strength modifier is eight, so four?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it'd push him back four squares.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh no, that's not a 20 for your strength contest, you mean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I just rolled it for the strength check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it should have been an attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So-- Yeah, no, he fails and he gets pushed back one, two, three, four-- skids back, catches himself there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great, I will spend an action surge and I will drive him back another--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to move forward into him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you move four, there's four attacks opportunity against you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, oh, I thought I was in a-- like wrapped around him grappled, during the shove, no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So your speed is zero, so you shove him back, and that's where he goes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are currently being held by one of the vampires.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will spend my action surge, yes, and I'll make two attacks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I guess the guys on my right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The the closest to Sylas on the right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there you got it, go ahead and roll two attacks against it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It'd be 21 points of slashing damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. And you still have your bonus action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, so my bonus action, I'll slam the Titanstone Knuckles together and I'll cast Enlarge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which forces him back a bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does that fuck with their grapple at all, growing that size?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you have-- you're pretty big now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike and Vex, you guys are down by the beach and the cliff, so you're about, roughly 100 feet away.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to put my hands on her and cast Cure Wounds at 4th-level.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know what am at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you guys went unconscious from the poison.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should we start making our way up there? What do you want to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Cure Wounds on myself as well at 3rd-level.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I'm going to take off running.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so that's 30 feet and 25 feet, you guys heading up the edge of the cliff here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then making your way the best you can and you about that here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I thought we were right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys were on the beach and the beach is kind of far away from where the cliff begins to rise up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys spread out at that point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, and then we're 100 away from the cliff side or 100 feet away from where Grog is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 100 feet away from where the edge of this map begins.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, Grog's going to be tanking for a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So while that's happening, for the sake of this, let's have everyone else roll initiative, so we can do this in the order it's supposed to be.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've been forgetting to roll some d6s.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's Trinket? Was he with the group?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you've resurrected-- you've come back with Trinket.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Man, this is intense for a wedding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Scanlan, Percy, Keyleth, and Derrig.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In the order of the initiative or?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Any order right now and then we'll start with the initiative order next round.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do I have on me, out of curiosity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have whatever your comfortable formal outfit was for the rehearsal, you had your ceremonial weapon at your side, which is your hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What else would you have had on you for that event?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I mean like I might have had one of the most basic guns, but that would have been all of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, I'll have my one basic gun, I definitely don't have any of my other fancy shit, though, do I?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would it have gotten wet? Does that do anything?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As long as I don't try and fire it underwater, it should be fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You had climbed quite a bit up, so at the raven's speed, I would say, if you double movement, you can get to the top of the cliff as a raven, right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and do that and circle around the side--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Circle around the side-- so right now, you have rushed around, and because I don't have a specific raven for you, I'll just say for now, this giant eagle represents where you are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trying to keep some cover as I make my way around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. So you watch Percy loop around as the raven and perch on the edge of the cliff side, just barely in within your sight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to drop Polymorph on him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I'm going to-- oh, sorry, you have more to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, that was your movement and your action to get over there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For a bonus action, I'm going to Second Wind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, Derrig, what are you guys doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan dropped it, Scanlan gets his turn as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan, are you no longer a dolphin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he's no longer a dolphin, he's climbing the edge of the cliff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far down, how tall is this cliff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about, I'd say, roughly 150 feet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So on my turn I will--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up to the very edge of the cliff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You appear right on the tip, like--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I will bonus action heal myself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 1st-level right, we are allowed to do that at this--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I appreciate the help, but this way I get to do a bonus action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, so that's one plus-- Charisma, six, or something, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Charisma six, all right, seven points, yes!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I will cast Sunbeam, that's my concentration spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, because you can cast in beast form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you cast Sunbeam, you have it, it's now concentrated.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'll hold for now, but it's on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you're still a water elemental, chilling on the edge of the cliff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I take this bonus action to turn into a earth elemental and slide to the edge of the cliff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you have unlimited beast shapes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's just the way it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you (whooshing), and then vanish into the cliff side.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I use my movement to elevator up a little bit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's everybody, so now we've-- Oh no, sorry, Derrig.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, if I saw her turn into a big rock thing, which I've seen three times before, and I see this lump go up the side, then I'm swimming towards land.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So since you're going along the cliff, we'll get you on to the cliff side there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay and then I'd like to make, I guess, an athletics check to climb that shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. On that side of the cliff, it's not as high, you only have about, I'd say, 80 or so feet, 70 feet to climb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so does the ring of free movement factor into this at all, if I don't like totally fuck my--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12, okay, you get out of the water and you start climbing the edge of the cliff a bit, you get about 15 feet up and that's as much this turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hop around to get a shot on two of the people who are getting in the way of Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, about there you can see them, right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to spend a grit point for piercing shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, against which one of these?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The two front ones in the line.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I don't get a bonus on that, do I?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's-- Nine points of damage to the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the second one you roll for another attack to hit him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe with disadvantage on that one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's just that it could, if I recall it's just a straight roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't have it on this phone, shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On this phone, how many phones do you have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think it's you get to attack the first one and then--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other ones I think, all the ones behind it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that's seven points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points of damage, you got it.

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to head up as fast as possible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can move ten feet a round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can get close to 20 feet--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to burn a Second Wind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you like, quickly hobble up the side, running with the little bit of movement you have in your ankles before (gasping) you reach the top.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And now I'm just going to scream bloody murder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would like the rest of you to go ahead and roll a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, fucking come on, you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, the three of you, as you're rushing towards the cliff side, hear the faint sound of a scream echo across the rocks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you recognize it to be Percival's scream.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It sounds like it's coming from the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So either you can head towards the edge of the cliff up top, or head off to the side towards the water, but you guys'll--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have I finished casting the spell or is it still going?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll head towards the edge of the cliff.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll head towards-- I'll head towards the water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, are we, where we up on a ledge?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or you guys can do both, what are you--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to keep yelling anyways, so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm an excellent swimmer, I'll go water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's Pike and who else in the water?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I go in the water, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so it's you four in the water and it's just Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh you're going in the water?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to the cliff edge.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And minutes of held breath is our con modifier?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your con modifier's how many minutes you can hold your breath, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that's what's listed under saving throws, or just what's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're screaming and yelling up there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, I need you to make a death saving throw for me, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The last bit of air can--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go water elemental.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You (sloshing water) into water elemental (watery explosion) and coast right into the waves.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hauling ass in the direction that I heard Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the speed on that water elemental?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to pull it up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Used a bonus action to transform, that's both your Wild Shapes--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am going to Polymorph into a dolphin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So double movement that's 120 feet per round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you're shooting forward, making your way towards that cliff--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: ♪ Making your way towards that cliff ♪

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, you're trying to swim along, you're in the water with Derrig?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You and Derrig are both now in the water trying to swim.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, just trying to swim towards Percy because that's all we can-- all I can hear.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm running straight up all of the-- triple dash, looking over the edge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another death saving throw for me, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Son of a bitch, son of a bitch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, just roll high, that's all you got to do is roll high.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Feel like, regardless of success or failure, is my lungs are filling with water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, if you roll three successes, we're going to keep rolling, this is to see how long you last underwater.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't stabilize underwater while you're drowning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to still say, it's hard to step away from Caduceus, but--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're still a ways away, though, but traveling quickly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh man, what do I even have?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You are dying, I'll remind you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't die, I have shifting bulges coming to save me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We all deal with death in different ways.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Time for some creative thinking, I guess.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I have lots of that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we're both the weakest motherfuckers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to try one more time to just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you trying to break the chains? Wait, what are you trying to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm trying to break the lock.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just straight up break the lock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a brute force against the lock, it's going to be strength.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Feels like a decent hit, but it still holds.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god, mother-- Do I have anything left that I can--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another death saving throw for you, Vex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --making your way as fast as you can in that direction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my god, what if I don't-- what if I die?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we get all of our gifts back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't think you can do it as a water elemental.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I just want to use everything I have to get there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am in a wedding dress. Don't kill me when I'm in a wedding dress.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not in your wedding dress at the rehearsal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm still trucking up the cliff side, is there anything as I'm running up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The shouting seems to have gotten their attention.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I see what they are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Keyleth, Scanlan, you guys are rushing quickly--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Darkvision too, can I see them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're quite a distance away, you can just barely see Percy perched on the edge of the cliff, shouting and trying to break his lock against the stone.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Am I getting close to Percy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, they're further than that from you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm trying to go towards Percy, so don't I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're-- it's like trying to swim behind a motor boat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He has a ring of free movement, does that have any effect on water, am I going normal speed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does. You're going normal speed through the water.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, not as fast as them, but pretty good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you are, Pike, unfortunately being left in the suds a bit here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know what else to do--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are getting close, but you're not--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, I need you to roll another death saving throw, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you rush up, the next round, and arrive as a water elemental in that space, and you can see her body just drift below the ocean, the eyes glazed over, unmoving.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then Percy seems okay, can I see Percy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's alive? And I'm going to immediately double back and get her back to Pike, A-snaps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the water elemental's now motor boating opposite direction, (slicing through water).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a big blobby water getting in reverse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A few moments pass, Pike, as you're trying to keep up, you watch as your new, half-elf friend there looks and spins as one heavy, moving, shifting burst of water just cruises up in your direction before splashing you in the face and you see a large water elemental Keyleth emerge from the ocean holding the unmoving body of Vex.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like a rolling wave onto the beach, I just come up out of the water and drop them both onto the beach.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you move past Pike, then?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And crash onto the beach with them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all get thrown out onto the sand and there you see Vex (rolling body) onto the--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is she okay, is she okay?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I drop form. I think she's dead, you have to do something, immediately.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I reach out, I put my hands out, and I cast True Resurrection.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Has it been under a minute?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What do all-- is True Resurrection--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: True Resurrection does cost at least 25,000 gold worth of diamonds to do.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hold on, hold on, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, because resurrection--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait but I thought these mean a-- shit, sorry, this has been a while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know it's been a while, it's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have diamonds on you, as part of this wedding?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you wearing any jewelry for the event?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Vex's has got to be wearing some bling,

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I already used my ring, for the search for Bob, but-- And we haven't replaced them yet, we were going to do that tomorrow, dear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know how-- if they're worth that much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead, Pike, and roll 2d6 for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six, all right, the earrings that Vex has on are worth approximately 600 gold worth of diamonds, all over on them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pump those fucking earrings into her body!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think that's how it works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as part of our resurrection ritual elements there--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, wait, wait, DM, DM, DM, DM.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the Revivify has an element here, where, when it brings you back I roll, just in general, to see if the previous resurrections you've had to see what the different DC is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, yes, the twins died to the Briarwoods.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Disintegration and you went down, too, but--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, regardless, that's higher than the DC would have had, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, suddenly, Vex coughs up sea water and doubles over, spitting it onto the edge of the ocean.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was the DC 12 or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was either 11 or 12 based on how many she died, so the natural 13 worked out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm scaling up the cliff face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I go back into elemental form, grab Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're out there as the dolphin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, Keyleth you rush over and hit the edge, as the dolphin, and you look up and you can see Percival's slowly crab walking up the side of this cliff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we have earrings, can we talk to each other through our fucking earrings?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have them on, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The cliff is just stone, there's nothing--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's stone and minerals, and salts, and sea gull shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you get her? Did you get her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are approaching the edge of the cliff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, they're like tourists looking over the edge?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you see, for the first time, Sylas Briarwood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys had dinner in the sunset, remember?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The four other figures begin to move rapidly, in a flanking position as he walks towards you, confidently.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dragging a blade behind him, across the stone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Same blade that he fought you guys with at the battle in Thar Amphala.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) Actually, no, this is an axe, it's a greataxe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When I get over to Percy, I'm going to drop my polymorph, cling on to the rocks, see him struggling up there, and cast Polymorph on him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And turn him into a raven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right (fluttering), you are now a raven, Percival.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're good, I just need help getting up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I get a move, a round?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seeing as how this has now turned into a combat scenario.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's going to turn off his torches.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to fight fucking Sylas?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There might be a Delilah clone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't believe I just fucking died.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was stressful, way too stressful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to leave you as a raven for, like, 30 seconds, so you can get up to the fucking top of the thing and then I'm going to drop it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Am I going to still be manacled when I'm in the raven?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That cliff edge there is about roughly 150 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Grog, you're approached to about there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't have any guns or anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't have any of our stuff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How are we going to do anything?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuckin' Sylas, I thought he was deader'en shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought he turned into a mist.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm ready to fight for my life.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I look like a New Orleans funeral driver.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm Duke of York this evening.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm just going to keep concentrating on him for like another-- until I see him get over the edge and then I was going to drop it, basically.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Meanwhile, Pike and Keyleth, you are currently in--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm in the water as a water elemental.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you cruise around and you were right there next to Scanlan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You had placed me, I was just trying to keep up with her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little ways away over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Pike-- did you bring Pike, or is anybody else with you or are you guys still on the beach?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I dropped Pike on the beach with Vex.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When swimming, will we do action-- movement and use action as a further movement?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah I mean, I would, that would be mean 60 feet of range for me swimming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So we have-- What's your dexterity?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is your favored terrain, Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do a little Billy Elliot move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, the other two do, and they have advantage because they have you flanked.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we say that because I have persistent rage and the danger has not subsided, that I could rage all the way through running, all the way up the cliff from the wedding site? From the rehearsal dinner?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you really want to, sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I wouldn't have dropped it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, you been real angry at the fact that the couple went missing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be a 25 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take six points of slashing damage, reduced to three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Claw attack again, that's going to be a 22 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take another nine points of slashing damage reduced to four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be a 33 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be 24 points slashing damage reduced to 12.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt did not come to play softball tonight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys left my fucking dust titan behind in the last one shot, I'm going to make this right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We all were, like, busy finding our fucking outfits for tonight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's going to be 27 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With my action, I would like to try and lunge forward and tackle Sylas and drive him straight backwards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and make a-- We'll say a grapple-- is this a shove? Try and push him back?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, how far is a shove?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because your strength is so high, I'll say it's half your strength modifier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, so my strength modifier is eight, so four?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it'd push him back four squares.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh no, that's not a 20 for your strength contest, you mean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I just rolled it for the strength check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it should have been an attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So-- Yeah, no, he fails and he gets pushed back one, two, three, four-- skids back, catches himself there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great, I will spend an action surge and I will drive him back another--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to move forward into him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you move four, there's four attacks opportunity against you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, oh, I thought I was in a-- like wrapped around him grappled, during the shove, no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So your speed is zero, so you shove him back, and that's where he goes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are currently being held by one of the vampires.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will spend my action surge, yes, and I'll make two attacks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I guess the guys on my right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The the closest to Sylas on the right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there you got it, go ahead and roll two attacks against it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It'd be 21 points of slashing damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. And you still have your bonus action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, so my bonus action, I'll slam the Titanstone Knuckles together and I'll cast Enlarge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which forces him back a bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does that fuck with their grapple at all, growing that size?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you have-- you're pretty big now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike and Vex, you guys are down by the beach and the cliff, so you're about, roughly 100 feet away.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to put my hands on her and cast Cure Wounds at 4th-level.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know what am at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you guys went unconscious from the poison.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should we start making our way up there? What do you want to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Cure Wounds on myself as well at 3rd-level.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I'm going to take off running.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so that's 30 feet and 25 feet, you guys heading up the edge of the cliff here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then making your way the best you can and you about that here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I thought we were right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys were on the beach and the beach is kind of far away from where the cliff begins to rise up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys spread out at that point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, and then we're 100 away from the cliff side or 100 feet away from where Grog is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 100 feet away from where the edge of this map begins.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, Grog's going to be tanking for a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So while that's happening, for the sake of this, let's have everyone else roll initiative, so we can do this in the order it's supposed to be.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've been forgetting to roll some d6s.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's Trinket? Was he with the group?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you've resurrected-- you've come back with Trinket.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Man, this is intense for a wedding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Scanlan, Percy, Keyleth, and Derrig.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In the order of the initiative or?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Any order right now and then we'll start with the initiative order next round.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do I have on me, out of curiosity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have whatever your comfortable formal outfit was for the rehearsal, you had your ceremonial weapon at your side, which is your hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What else would you have had on you for that event?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I mean like I might have had one of the most basic guns, but that would have been all of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, I'll have my one basic gun, I definitely don't have any of my other fancy shit, though, do I?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would it have gotten wet? Does that do anything?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As long as I don't try and fire it underwater, it should be fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You had climbed quite a bit up, so at the raven's speed, I would say, if you double movement, you can get to the top of the cliff as a raven, right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and do that and circle around the side--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Circle around the side-- so right now, you have rushed around, and because I don't have a specific raven for you, I'll just say for now, this giant eagle represents where you are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trying to keep some cover as I make my way around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. So you watch Percy loop around as the raven and perch on the edge of the cliff side, just barely in within your sight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to drop Polymorph on him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I'm going to-- oh, sorry, you have more to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, that was your movement and your action to get over there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For a bonus action, I'm going to Second Wind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, Derrig, what are you guys doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan dropped it, Scanlan gets his turn as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan, are you no longer a dolphin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he's no longer a dolphin, he's climbing the edge of the cliff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far down, how tall is this cliff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about, I'd say, roughly 150 feet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So on my turn I will--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up to the very edge of the cliff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You appear right on the tip, like--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I will bonus action heal myself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 1st-level right, we are allowed to do that at this--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I appreciate the help, but this way I get to do a bonus action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, so that's one plus-- Charisma, six, or something, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Charisma six, all right, seven points, yes!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I will cast Sunbeam, that's my concentration spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, because you can cast in beast form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you cast Sunbeam, you have it, it's now concentrated.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'll hold for now, but it's on.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so he has to make a strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that would help a lot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And he also takes his damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, that is going to be a 22.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But he still takes-- Still takes 14 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's starting to look a little haggard, you can see now, the sweat and the dark undead blood that's pouring out of his face, he's starting to look like he's-- He's not doing great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take another-- I'm going to take a-- I can't remember any of the names to anything, a deadeye, one more deadeye shot, just to make sure I hit him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I only have like two more grit points left, but fuck it, one more dead shot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which is a hemorrhaging shot, which means--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes half the damage next turn that he takes from this shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll your critical damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh fuck, and he'll take 13 the next round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the beginning of his turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I also get back one of my points, which I'm going to use to make one last deadeye shot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're flexing it out of your garter.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just misses, well I'm going to burn my last action surge, and take four more shots.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you reload at some point?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two more, let's just take 'em together.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get it, get it, get it, girl.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And it jams on me and I put it away and dart off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You duck behind, end of your turn, he's going to use his last legendary action to move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is running from the light because that shit is about to burn his face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So his turn, he's going to run from Grog and attempt to follow suit with Sylas.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will take an attack of opportunity against him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three, 17, 21 two points of necrotic for 23, 27 points of slashing damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He just like runs-- and then ash goes (puff) onto the rock surface there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends their turn, Keyleth you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I use my bonus action to turn into an air elemental?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bonus action air elemental, fly a speed of 90 feet towards Sylas.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, and I still have my Sunbeam going.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I'm going to take it and I want to harness it, and I want to drive it right into him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what you're saying is, you're full on, like, Son Goku like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Combining all sunlight elements into his face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, what is the saving throw for that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get it, gurl, get it get it get it, gurl.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't do this to me right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let me double check, let me double check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's okay, Sunbeam, it is constitution.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to use another legendary resistance to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he uses legendary resistance and succeeds, go ahead and roll damage, he takes half.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finish your turn then, Keyleth?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I'm going to hit Grog in the back and say, "Tell her to go!" and have Keyleth move half her movement forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're this way, everyone else is this way, he's starting to think of what his next step it to escape.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'll just leave it at that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sylas get his legendary actions back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is technically now out of the radius of the sun, so he doesn't take radiant damage at the start of his turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But he does take the 13 from Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does take the 13 from Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Goes into his bat form-- And I'll use--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: ♪ Na, na, na, na, na, na, na, na ♪

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say for the purpose of that, I'll just keep this as the bat form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he is-- trying to just get out of there best he can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Legendary shit can make him move.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will use my action to double that to 100.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you rush and you get basically, right where Keyleth is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How high off the ground is he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, he's about 40 feet off the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm just going to fuckin' throw my Bloodaxe up at him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 26, 30, four points of necrotic for 34, and 35 total.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I don't think, I think it's like half damage on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The axe buries into the bat from underneath and you watch, let me see here-- Yeah, he-- The bat, double check because he's polymorphed into it, so yeah, the bat form drops and he slams onto the ground, right next to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh guys, you could Goodfellas, like kick him, right on the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it was your action to throw the axe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I used my action to double my speed and my bonus action was to throw, so that's that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, all right, that brings us to Pike and Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As much as I can to put him back in the daylight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's just outside of the daylight with that movement speed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Even if you double it with her action, you double run?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course you're going to shoot your magical fucking bow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Spiritual Weapon is radiant damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right fuck it, then I'm going to fuckin' try to hit him, with a fuckin' arrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's prone, so you have disadvantage on the attacks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he's prone, I thought he landed like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he did land on like--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We start with a douche and we end with the bouche.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So let's look at the range on this, the long bow is-- 150 foot range, yeah he's in your range you can to make, no disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, go to roll damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the range on Hunter's Mark?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! but he's surrounded, I get sneak attack, bitch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's eight, that's 16 plus 1d4 lightning, that's 18 plus--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's considered radiant damage, yeah, so--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (cheering) (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you're not going to be glad at all because I'm going to keep moving forward as I'm saying it and I'm going to put him in radiant blast as I shoot him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And right as he falls on his back and begins to turn into mist, the outer range of Pelor's blessing on you, the Dawnfather's radiant-- and you watch him scream as his body just flakes into a hundred pieces of gray ash before it-- just dissipates.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't believe that motherfucker killed me the day before our wedding.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who is that? It's so bright.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's got an hour of effect.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't tell a bride she looks tired the day before-- What's wrong with you? God.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Please, what's a best man for.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm pretty sure not this, but this was, this was good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He didn't even come to fucking save us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, he was pretty assed out.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think he's still probably-- Sleeping, I think a lot of--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everyone was drugged at your wedding.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean I have to say, it's like a beautiful spot though.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And then there's like a golden glow with the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a little bit of-- last--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Last bit of starlight, is coming out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we better not risk it, if we waited another day there could be another attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I-- Oh yes, I brought it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also, side note, your dad hasn't arrived yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You really do have a beautiful glow about you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sure, should we have someone go get Vesper, or do you want her to sleep?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, let me just take out my officiate notes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's no traces of Briarwood anything, right? Not fingers, or jewels, or jewelry, or like--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know, it was his.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to use a Major Image to make a chuppah over them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'll use Druidcraft to make a bouquet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Of snow drops, and hand it to her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah? Oh shit-- fuck-- um-- and I in my giant, enlarged form smash the stones and I grab what look like a bunch of pebbles and I start-- throwing them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hello, yes-- (laughing) I was just waiting for my cue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just get the fuck up there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, Scanlan, walk me down the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The ceremony's happening on the edge of the cliff, so we'll go in a bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And you can get on my back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I will roar a mighty roar-- and I'll-- (heavy footfalls) walk her down the isle with a little flare.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you're perfect the-- Some civility, I suppose.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get there and climb off of Scanlan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So glad I asked you to do that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Don't worry, Grog, you're my very, very bestest friend.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Lady Vex'ahlia, my sister, and Lord Percival Fredrickstein von Musel-- (laughing)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Who would like to go first?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that mean I go first or you do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I promise to walk into the future with you, I promise to build a family with you, and I promise to always be here for an adventure with you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Vex, do you promise to take this man and cherish him and love him in every way?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Percy, do you promise to take this woman and cherish her and love her in every way?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you also promise to love and cherish Trinket, for all of his days?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm aware that's part of the bargain.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So by the power invested in me--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh shit, sorry, I didn't get--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you have both of the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh I have both of them, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike, before you do this, may I just offer one more word?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A wish that your brother would be able to speak to you for just a moment or two, on your wedding day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, how do you word your wish?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I wish that Vax'ildan can say a few words at his sister's wedding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From under the cloak, as it opens, you see a familiar set of black leather armor, feathered mantle, and black hair, as Vax'ildan, the eternal champion, companion to the Raven Queen, steps for the first time in over a year, briefly on this mortal plane.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You said there's a mask affixed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Elements of it remind you of Percival's mask but it's elegant and detailed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (as Vax) Scanlan Shorthalt, you are toying with the designs of the gods, still, I see, old friend.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What, I didn't have a present, so--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's very, very big, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the Raven Queen's visage opened up the cloak and that's were Vax'ildan stepped out of.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Am I allowed to hug him? Am I--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Congratulations on this, your first of many blessings, Percival.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't be weird, talk normal, talk normal, talk normal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am so proud, of all of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't be weird, go hug her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Zephrah blossoms under your boughs as I knew it would.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not the same without you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How am I supposed to get over you if you keep sending ravens to me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am imperfect, as are the gods.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nor I, but you will live and your life will touch thousands.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am far but not gone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then he scatters against the wind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you watch the feathers scatter and you look back and the figure, the image of the Raven Queen is no more.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hope so, I think it was my last wish.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth Druidcrafts 1,000 fireflies to just explode outward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And to celebrate the joining of Lord and Lady de Rolo of Whitestone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The fuck you did-- (slam) (laughter) That's mine!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I've never done a wedding in-game, that's crazy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys, I love you so much.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It had everything that weddings should have, vampires, and drowning-- poison--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When this one-shot apparated through the Kickstarter, I was like, "I want there to be some-- another element of closure to this, what are some hanging threads in the campaign?" And I was like, "Fuck."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Once we're done with those, we're in the clear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we get the deposit back on the venue? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not covered for acts of vampire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we're going to have a really badass day tomorrow, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, thank you guys, we love you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We love you very much and-- Is it Thursday, yet?
